mapper.select:
select ts.sname, ts.pid, ts.prs, ts.pst, ts.ftr, ts.byd, tsc.* from t_song ts, t_score tsc
tsc.uid = #{uid} and tsc.sid = ts.sid and ts.sname like concat('%', #{sname}, '%') and pid = #{pid}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_score
uid, sid, pst_score, pst_ptt, prs_score, prs_ptt, ftr_score, ftr_ptt, byd_score, byd_ptt,
VALUES
#{uid}, #{sid}, #{pstScore}, #{pstPtt}, #{prsScore}, #{prsPtt}, #{ftrScore}, #{ftrPtt}, #{bydScore}, #{bydPtt},
mapper.select: select t_song.sname sname, t_score.sid sid, pst_score score, pst_ptt ptt, time time, '1' difficulty_type, t_song.pst difficulty from t_score left join t_song on t_score.sid = t_song.sid where t_score.uid = #{uid} and t_score.pst_score is not null union select t_song.sname sname, t_score.sid sid, prs_score score, prs_ptt ptt, time time, '2' difficulty_type, t_song.prs difficulty from t_score left join t_song on t_score.sid = t_song.sid where t_score.uid = #{uid} and t_score.prs_score is not null union select t_song.sname sname, t_score.sid sid, ftr_score score, ftr_ptt ptt, time time, '3' difficulty_type, t_song.ftr difficulty from t_score left join t_song on t_score.sid = t_song.sid where t_score.uid = #{uid} and t_score.ftr_score is not null union select t_song.sname sname, t_score.sid sid, byd_score score, byd_ptt ptt, time time, '4' difficulty_type, t_song.byd difficulty from t_score left join t_song on t_score.sid = t_song.sid where t_score.uid = #{uid} and t_score.byd_score is not null order by ptt desc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_score (uid, sid, pst_score, pst_ptt, prs_score, prs_ptt, ftr_score, ftr_ptt, byd_score, byd_ptt) values
(#{score.uid}, #{score.sid}, #{score.pstScore}, #{score.pstPtt}, #{score.prsScore}, #{score.prsPtt}, #{score.ftrScore}, #{score.ftrPtt}, #{score.bydScore}, #{score.bydPtt})
mapper.select: select tsc.pst_score, tsc.prs_score, tsc.ftr_score, tsc.byd_score, ts.sgid songId from t_score tsc left join aptc.t_song ts on tsc.sid = ts.sid where uid = #{uid};
